   sphinx-quickstart on Sun Jul 22 11:04:41 2018.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to the rigBot 2.0 documentation!
================================================

This is a set of rig tools meant to provide a modular, self-contained, character pipe for creating, transferring, exporting, importing and
other essential functions relating to the organization and management of scene file, scripts, and data for all types of rigs

offers fully UI based and/or fully scripted approach.
The idea is that the  UI simply serves as an interactive wrapper for the underlying code.


In short, anything you can do In the UI you can do with code and vice versa.


Acknowledgements and Contributions
====================================
This is a work in progress,  meant to be a collaborative project with design and code contributions from colleagues and friends.

Contributors include :

Peter Christensen
Andrei Orehov
Jen H.
Casey Dame
Manny Wong
Olyssa Gurezova

extra special thanks to G.
